sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>At the beginning of each game session, the character gains credits equal to his ranks in Sound Investments X 100. How this money is earned is up to the player and GM, and could be actual investments, business dealings, or even a small legal or illegal side business. The GM can also decide that the current events of the adventure may make these funds temporarily unavailable.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Sound Investments</name> <number>TAL0001275</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-12 05:43:46</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5e9688b32f10e090e0f497eef699b695</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-12 05:44:10</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
